> "We wont know till we reach the Black Fortress and made a full scan" hissed
> hydras while he retreat"Then we will know"

In quick order Hydras and his team are able to make it back to his
newly rebuilt base. Nearly everything about it seemed new and fresh .
The doors opened as he approached as sensors detected his presence.
Everything responded quickly to any voice command that he chose to
utter.

As they got Cyclonus back to the medical bay Fractyl quickly took
charge of things, far more comfortable and even somewhat assertive in
this more familiar enviornment. He quickly ran scans over the
Insecticon, Bruticus-X and Cyclonus.

Fractyl looked up at Hydras, "These will need some time in the
recharge chamber, but will other wise be fine."

Stepping over to Scourge he ran the scanner over him and frowned, "He
on the other hand will require a bit more work." he said carefully.
"He appears to have been partially drained of energy in a way that I
cannot yet understand."

Iguanus and Inferno stood off to one side, letting the others work.
They were primarilly warriors and soldiers, this was not their field
of expertise.

Deepstryke, Phobia and Blackrazor also stood and waited, each with
troubled looks. In a way Scourge was family, and they took his fall
seriously.

Cyclonus looked at Fractyl, "If you need an energon transfusion, I am
ready." he said quickly.

"No." Fractyl said, "I believe I can handle this. But Even if I did
need it, you are in no condition to do that. You need repairs
yourself."

"I will wait till he his finished before I get mine." Cyclonus said stubbornly.

Fractyl looked at Hydras hopping he would get Cyclonus to get some repairs.

At the same time Hydras gets a communication, "Sir, this is Sky
Shadow. We still have your spark under survellience. So far there has
been no movement."

(TAG)

OOC: Sky Shadow's info can be found at:
http://tfwiki.net/wiki/Sky_Shadow_%28BW%29
